resources.string:
A demo app for displaying a list of routes 
\and previewing individual routes. 

The routes data is duplicated to allow for pagination. 

The route details shows the waypoints, corresponding stop markers, as well we routing details. 

The routing details include step-by-step details including the students to pick at each stop. 

Click on individual stops to pan the map to the corresponding location. 

GeoApify is used to retrieve detailed routing and Google Maps is used to visualize an interactive map of the route. 

Stack/architecture: clean MVVM architecture, Jetpack Compose, Retrofit, Hilt, KotlinX serialization, DataStore and others.

API keys are missing, please ensure to add in your local.properties file: 

1.) Add your Google Maps key as MAPS_API_KEY=YOUR_KEY 

2.) Add your GeoApify key as GEOAPIFY_API_KEY=YOUR_KEY
